channel.title: 317 Drop Help
channel.description: Well, I've been coding my server a bit today, and I decided to add a new training area. I wanted to make the Zombies drop bones, so I found my NPCDrops.TSM and opened it up. When I looked around, I couldn't find zombie drops, and when I tried adding it manually, it didn't work. I looked around on youtube a bit, but they're all for Delta (I believe). If you need to see what I'm dealing with, here's a preview : [code]#Infernal mage 1643:10 560:150 656:1 995:500 1387:1 554:150 562:150 557:150 555:150 1379:1 1618:3 1620:3 1602:3[/code]

item.title: 317 Drop Help
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

add more random ass drops. i figured that out with mine. when i was adding drops i wanted the npc to drop only 2 items. then i was like ugh its not working! so try adding a few more drops (5+?) and work with it from there

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Drop Help

item.description:
@Rectification wrote:

Still nothing. Here’s what I have for the Zombie’s :

#Zombie 421:100 526:1
Can somebody please help?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Drop Help
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[quote=“Rectification, post:1, topic:408151”]Well, I’ve been coding my server a bit today, and I decided to add a new training area. I wanted to make the Zombies drop bones, so I found my NPCDrops.TSM and opened it up. When I looked around, I couldn’t find zombie drops, and when I tried adding it manually, it didn’t work. I looked around on youtube a bit, but they’re all for Delta (I believe). If you need to see what I’m dealing with, here’s a preview : #Infernal mage <---- Name of the Npc 1643:10 <--- the npc's id & drop percentage 560:150 <--- item it drops and the ammount. 656:1 995:500 1387:1 554:150 562:150 557:150 555:150 1379:1 1618:3 1620:3 1602:3[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Drop Help

item.description:
@Rectification wrote:

Well, I’ve been coding my server a bit today, and I decided to add a new training area. I wanted to make the Zombies drop bones, so I found my NPCDrops.TSM and opened it up. When I looked around, I couldn’t find zombie drops, and when I tried adding it manually, it didn’t work. I looked around on youtube a bit, but they’re all for Delta (I believe). If you need to see what I’m dealing with, here’s a preview : #Infernal mage 1643:10 560:150 656:1 995:500 1387:1 554:150 562:150 557:150 555:150 1379:1 1618:3 1620:3 1602:3
